reviewText: Parents and professionals will find this DVD very helpful. Parents will find material they can use immediately to help their children and professionals will find this useful in their work with parents. I watched this DVD and found the presentation very informative and elegant. The use of lecture,PowerPoint, DVD presentations of actual sessions makes this DVD a well produced easy to watch DVD. Most importantly, I found the material to be useful in my practice helping children in the child welfare system. Dr. Becker-Weidman explains the concepts very well. I now have a framework for training parents of children with trauma and attachment disorders that I use in my practice. The approach is grounded in Dyadic Developmental Psychotherapy, which is an evidence-based, effective, and empirically validated treatment. For other good resources see: Creating Capacity For Attachment Principles of Attachment Parenting Attachment-Focused Family Therapy Treating Complex Traumatic Stress Disorders: An Evidence-Based Guide
